subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James had dunked and danced and did whatever else pleased him on his way to 22 points, 7 rebounds and 7 assists in the Cleveland Cavaliers’ rout of the Knicks.
snippet: LeBron James had dunked and danced and did whatever else pleased him on his way to 22 points, 7 rebounds and 7 assists in the Cleveland Cavaliers’ rout of the Knicks.
